column4: IBM settles legal dispute with diversity officer hired by Microsoft
column5: International Business Machines Corp on Monday said it settled a trade secrets lawsuit it brought against its former chief diversity officer who left for a similar job at Microsoft Corp.

column4: IBM settles legal dispute with diversity officer hired by Microsoft
column5: March 5 International Business Machines Corp on Monday said it settled a trade secrets lawsuit it brought against its former chief diversity officer who left for a similar job at Microsoft Corp.

column4: Republican lawmakers back review of Broadcom's Qualcomm bid
column5: WASHINGTON U.S. Republican lawmakers on Monday backed a U.S. panel's decision to delay semiconductor firm Qualcomm Inc  shareholder meeting to allow for a more extensive review of Broadcom Ltd's  takeover bid.

column4: UPDATE 1-U.S. Republican lawmakers back review of Broadcom's Qualcomm bid
column5: WASHINGTON  March 5 U.S. Republican lawmakers on Monday backed a U.S. panel's decision to delay semiconductor firm Qualcomm Inc shareholder meeting to allow for a more extensive review of Broadcom Ltd's takeover bid.
